description:
Caesar hatches a plan to forever silence his enemies, Chopper races through the compound in search of the drugged children, and Tashigi`s men make the ultimate sacrifice!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les larmes de Tashigi. La manoeuvre désespérée du G-5 !
Tashigi no Namida: G-5 Kesshi no Toppa Sakusen
Tashigi`s Tears! G-5`s Desperate Breakthrough Plan!
Слезы Ташиги! Самоубийственный план прорыва G-5!
たしぎの涙 G5決死の突破作戦
